mapper.sql: select product_id, product_name, price, old_price, p_status, descript, category_name, category_id, create_time, is_delete, picture from product_info
mapper.select: select * from product_info where p_status = 0 order by create_time desc

select product_id as'id' , product_name as 'name', product_id as'spuCode', descript as 'desc', price, if(price >= 35, price - 30.00, price) as 'oldPrice', picture, (select COUNT(o.id) from order_item o where o.product_id = #{id}) as 'salesCount', (select COUNT(c.com_id) from product_comment c where c.p_id = #{id}) as 'commentCount', (select COUNT(s.col_id) from user_collects s where s.pid = #{id}) as 'collectCount' , (( SELECT count( 0 ) FROM product_comment c WHERE c.p_id = product_id AND c.score = 5 ) / ( SELECT count( 0 ) FROM product_comment c WHERE c.p_id = product_id )) * 100 AS 'praisePercent', ( SELECT if(ISNULL(s.col_id),'false','true') FROM user_collects s WHERE s.is_delete = 0 AND s.user_id = #{userId} AND s.pid = #{id} ) AS 'collect'
from product_info where p_status = 0 and product_id = #{id};
select id, product_id, img, update_time from product_image where product_id = #{id}

SELECT p.product_id AS 'id', p.picture, p.product_name AS 'name', p.descript as'desc',p.price FROM product_info p where p_status = 0 ORDER BY (SELECT count(c.col_id) FROM user_collects c WHERE c.pid = p.product_id) + (SELECT count(me.p_id) FROM product_comment me WHERE p.product_id = me.p_id) desc limit 0 ,6
select a.category_id as 'id' ,a.category_name as 'name' , a.parent_id as'parent' from product_category a ,product_info i where a.category_id = i.category_id and i.product_id = #{id};
select c.category_id as 'id',c.category_name as 'name' from product_category c where c.category_id = #{id};
